definition: The word "schlank" refers to the state or quality of being slender or slim. It is commonly used to describe a person's physical appearance, indicating that they have a lean and well-proportioned body.

examples.german: Er hat eine schlankere Figur als früher.
examples.english: He has a slimmer figure than before.

examples.german: Die schlanken Linien des Gebäudes sind sehr elegant.
examples.english: The sleek lines of the building are very elegant.
She likes to wear slim-fitting clothes.

examples.german: Der neue Laptop ist leicht und schlank.
examples.english: The new laptop is lightweight and slim.
